about_the_game:
With this module you will be unlock the full and unlimited support for "Project Cars 2" (by Slightly Mad Studios) in Sim Racing Telemetry.

To use this module you must own a copy of "Project Cars 2" on a supported platform (PC, PS4/5, Xbox) and follow the integrated instructions to record data.

Note: this product is not made by, or affiliated with, the developer and/or owners of the game.

To record data, both the computer running SRT and the PC/console running the game must be connected to the same network. The game and SRT can run on the same computer. SRT records only complete timed laps. Follow the integrated instructions (Help button in the Recording view) to configure the game and properly record telemetry data.

List of support parameters

  • Angular velocity
  • Throttle (filtered)
  • Brake (filtered)
  • Clutch (filtered)
  • Steering (filtered)
  • Split-time ahead
  • Split-time behind
  • Oil temperature
  • Oil pressure
  • Water temperature
  • Water pressure
  • Fuel pressure
  • Boost active
  • Boost level
  • Terrain
  • Terrain (FL)
  • Terrain (FR)
  • Terrain (RL)
  • Terrain (RR)
  • Tyres on ground
  • Tyre on ground (FL)

NOTE: DLCs on Steam are not transferable to other supported platforms (iOS, Android): digital stores are run by different companies and they don't allow us to transfer purchases made in other stores.

short_description: With this module you will be able to record and analyze telemetries from "Project Cars 2" (by Slightly Mad Studios).
